name: DIE DIE DIE
description:
Made in Scratch 3.0.

Aim your mouse and shoot. Heads-up: It's a very fast-paced game. AND VERY HARD.

If you like stupidly hard shooting games, this is your thing.

For the best experience, use a touchscreen.

Bugs identified:

Touching two bugs at the exact same time somehow increases the FEAR% beyond the threshold.

Gun clones multiple bullet cases on the game over screen's tap reset. Make sure to click the STOP SIGN and then the GREEN FLAG for a hard reset. Might be a touchscreen issue, too.

The dude's head covers up the crosshair, protecting the roaches from getting shot. Oops.
